chinese: 老实说我再同意不过了

spanish: honestamente no podría estar más de acuerdo

pinyin: wǒ bǎi fēn zhī bǎi tóngyì
spanish: estoy de acuerdo cien por ciento
eso es exactamente lo que pienso
así es exactamente como me siento

english: you took the words right out of my mouth
pinyin: nǐ shuō chū le wǒ xiǎng shuō de huà
spanish: me quitaste las palabras de la boca
portuguese: você tirou as palavras da minha boca

chinese: 老实说你读懂了我的心思
pinyin: lǎoshíshuō nǐ dú dǒng le wǒ de xīnsi

english: I feel the same way honestly
I feel the same about it
pinyin: wǒ duì cǐ yǒu tóngyàng de gǎnjué

pinyin: zhè cì wǒ hé nǐ zhàn zài yīqǐ

english: I'm not so sure about that

english: I have to disagree with you
spanish: tengo que estar en desacuerdo contigo
tengo que respetuosamente estar en desacuerdo

english: that's not how I see it
pinyin: wǒ bú shì zhème kàn de

eso no es necesariamente cierto en realidad

english: I have mixed feelings about it

english: I agree to some extent yes

chinese: 那我们就同意彼此不同意吧
